review: Picture and sound  quality are great. If my TV is on the right source and I click the home button on my fire remote or phone it will turn the TV on also. Only thing is volume cannot be controlled.

review: This is absolutely great. There is no buffering and it is way faster than using a DVD player to go on line for Amazon Prime. The voice remote is without equal and very handy to find a movie or serial without having to scroll through a bunch of preliminary junk
author: John M

review: Love this new way to enhance watching tv!! So glad I made the purchase !!

review: Its great to no longer have a HDMI cable running across the room as a trip hazard. Fire TV Stick is always plugged in and always up and running.

review: I have a Roku 3 and a Roku stick. This is easily as good as the Roku 3 and is much faster and more responsive than the Roku stick. Highly recommend.
